name: Days of Glory - a card deck-based RPG
name_original: Days of Glory - a card deck-based RPG
description:
Days of Glory is an RPG played with a deck of cards and simplified rules.

Based on small episodic sessions, where your weird flawed characters explore different worlds and the imagination of the Narrator can go wild.

Basic mechanics are not too hard to grasp and new players can get into the action pretty fast.
